author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
The Ice is the third accompanying novella in The Bound and the Broken series by Ryan Cahill, and is meant to be read between books 3 and 4 (Of War and Ruin, Of Empires and Dust, respectively). If you read it too soon, you might encounter spoilers, if you don’t read it before Of Empires […]

The post REVIEW: The Ice by Ryan Cahill appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Ice by Ryan Cahill
